Tip of the Day
Crafting outcome will help raise the chances for better quality items seen at the bottom of recipes in the crafting interface.

Berries
Type: Material
Value: 2
Fine Value: 15
Keywords: Ingredient
Plant
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Will do well to keep you reasonably fed in a pinch, or you could use them as an ingredient for your culinary creations.

The Berries item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Berries is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Wine Needs Basic Kitchen service or better. Cooking lvl. 21 15x Berries 5x Wine
Make a jelly sandwich Needs Basic Kitchen service or better. Cooking lvl. 37 2x Berries
2x Bread		 1x Jelly sandwich

Job Boards

Berries can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Granfiddich job board Granfiddich 144 +2  Trellin Faction Reputation

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Cliff foraging Foraging lvl. 25
Agility lvl. 20		 1-2 67.327% ~1 in 1 120 steps 60 steps
Wine grape stomping Cooking lvl. 45
Agility lvl. 30		 1 39.900% ~1 in 3 358 steps 163 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.

(Per Chest)† 		Odds

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.
